lines.gurmukhi: soeI pwro Kwiq gwiq ibibiD ibkwr hoq; soeI pwro Kwq gwq hoie aupcwr hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as consuming raw mercury produces several ailments in the body but when treated with certain chemicals and purified, can cure many diseases.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Eho hI pwrw KwiDAwˆ srIr AMdr Anykwˆ ivkwr rog aupj ipAw krdy hn; qy Eho hI pwrw KwiDAwˆ srIr dw aupcwr ielwj huMdw hY, Bwv srIr dy rog inivrqI dw kwrx huMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: soeI pwro prsq kMcnih soK lyq; soeI pwro prs qwNbo kink Dwir hY [

Unknown.translation: Just as gold placed in raw mercury reacts to lose its identity but when the same chemically reacted mercury mixes with copper becomes gold.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Eho hI pwrw prisAwˆ sony nUM c`t ilAw krdw hY, qy Eho pwrw hI qwˆby nUM prsn mwqR qy sonw bxw idMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: soeI pwro Aghu n hwQn kY gihE jwie; soeI pwro gutkw huie isD nmskwr hY [

Unknown.translation: The mercury that is so unstable and restless that it cannot be held with hands but the same becomes respectable for yogis and sidhs when converted chemically into small tablets.

Sant Sampuran Singh.translation: Eho pwrw hI AYfw cMcl hY ik h`Q nwl PiVAw nhIˆ jw sikAw krdw qy Eho hI pwrw jd gutkw golI bx jwˆdw hY qwˆ is`D srUp nmskwr jog hY, vw golI bx ky h`Q ivc AwXw mnu`K nUM nmskwr jog is`D bxw idMdw hY[

lines.gurmukhi: mwns jnmu pwie jYsIAY sMgiq imlY; qYsI pwvY pdvI pRqwp AiDkwr hY [469[

Unknown.translation: Similarly whatever company a person keeps during his life, he attains that capability and status in the world. If he enjoys the congregation of true devotees of the True Guru he achieves salvation by virtue of Guru's teachings. But despite being a discipl
